entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
